topic.title: Attributes
topic.shortdesc: The part of the data model describing the characteristics of Classes. Attributes define the data within the data model.

body.p: Within this publication, the names of Attributes are styled like this: NHS NUMBER.
Classes, Attributes and the Relationships between Classes collectively define the NHS Data Model.
A Class is something that you want to describe; the Attributes define the descriptive characteristics of the Class.
Attributes may specify the associated National Codes, for example: For example: CONSULTATION TYPE
